# Pumpkin Pie (filling)

## Ingredients

* 1.5 cups pumpkin (or 1 29 oz can of pumpkin - make sure it is pure pumpkin and doens't have added sugar, etc.)
* 0.75 cups milk
* 0.5 cups sugar
* 1 pst cinnamon
* 0.25 tsp cloves or all spice
* 2 eggs
* 4 tsp brandy

## Instructions

Beat together and pour into an unbaked pie crust and bake at 350&deg;F until a knife put in the middle comes clean, about 1 hour.

Or, pour into custard cups, place the cups in a pan of hot water and bake in the water until a nife inserted in the center comes clean, about 1 hour.

Cool several hours before serving.
